mapper.select: select sid,sname,gender,institute,inschool_date, dorm_id,(select dorm_capacity from dorm where dorm_id=student.dorm_id) dorm_capacity from student order by sid asc
select sid,sname,gender,institute,inschool_date, dorm_id,(select dorm_capacity from dorm where dorm_id=student.dorm_id) dorm_capacity from student where sname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select sid,sname,gender,institute,inschool_date, dorm_id,(select dorm_capacity from dorm where dorm_id=student.dorm_id) dorm_capacity from student where sid=#{sid}
mapper.update: update student set dorm_id=#{newDormId} where sid=#{sid}
mapper.insert: insert into student values((select max(sid)+1 from student),#{name},#{gender},#{institute},#{inschool_date},#{dorm_id})
